text.p: WITH MORE THAN 3000 PAYMENT TERMINALS AND A USER-FRIENDLY INTERFACE, WE ARE AVAILABLE 24/7!

card1.p: All mobile, utility, bank, internet, TV, government, etc. payments at eManat terminals!

card2.p: You can easily pay for the service you want at the eManat payment terminal near you!

card3.p: Make all payments conveniently, quickly and securely with eManat!

card1.p: When you make a payment, your payment is as soon as it is made, and the service provider is immediately notified of the transaction.

card2.p: eManat terminals are operational 24/7, and even last-minute payments are instantly reflected in the account.

card3.p: We provide innovations that meet our client's expectations while also expanding current offerings through the incorporation of innovative thinking.

card4.h5: Simple and easy to use interface
card4.p: eManat terminal's design is user-friendly, and the terminals are operationally developed with the customer's expectations in mind.

card5.p: The extensive coverage of eManat terminals means you can save time and money by making payments instantaneously.

card6.p: One of our guiding values is to be a solution-oriented company, thus we provide customer support that responds timely to all of your queries.

emekdasliq.p: As soon as you make a payment, the service provider will receive information about the payment, and the amount will be transferred to your balance immediately.

map.h4: Benefit from the simple, fast, and secure method of payments with eManat, a professional example of FinTech technology!

komandamiz.p: We are waiting for professionals and colleagues who want to make a difference in our team!

korperativ.p: We make every effort to contribute to the sustainable development of our country and its youth.
